onboarding_title_1: Do you want to go Faster?
onboarding_description_1: With WAYA you will go to any place as fast as possible
onboarding_description_2: We choose every captain to see if he is qualified to drive you.
onboarding_description_3: We have strict driving rules to ensure your safety.
onboarding_description_4:
Safety and Respect for All
Treat everyone with kindness and respect

Follow the rules
